PerfectNetExp.abs: muscadel 葡萄酒的一种, muscadet 米斯卡代, muscadel 麝香葡萄酒

means.word_mean: 1. white grape grown especially in the valley the Loire in France
2. dry white wine from the Loire Valley in France
